artifact.name: Boston 1974.521
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Head of Hadrian facing left. His head is bare and he is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_legend: G EN I O P R
artifact.reverse_type: Genius stands, draped about his waist, with his head turned to the left, he holds a cornucopia in his left hand and a patera (sacrificial, knobbed plate) over flaming altar in his right.

artifact.name: Boston 1975.787
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of laureate Hadrian, facing right. He is draped and cuirassed.
artifact.reverse_legend: P M TR P COS III
artifact.reverse_type: Jupiter standing in a 3/4 frontal pose with his head facing forward. He hods a staff in his left hand and a thunderbolt in his right.

artifact.name: Boston 52.1017
artifact.donor: In memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Head of Lucius Aelius, facing right. His head is bare and he is bearded.
artifact.reverse_legend: TRIB POT COS II; CONCORD (in exergue)
artifact.reverse_type: Draped Concordia is seated facing left on her throne. She is holding a patera (a sacrificial, knobbed plate) in her extended right hand and is resting her left on a cornucopia.

artifact.name: Boston 1975.789
artifact.sources_used: <bibl><hi rend="ital">BMCRE</hi></bibl> III, 360, no. 950 (7.40 gm.) and cl for date
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Draped bust of Sabina, facing right. She is wearing a tiara, and her hair is tied in a braid down her neck.
artifact.reverse_type: Vesta sits on her throne facing left. She holds a scepter in her left hand, and Palladium in her extended right hand.

artifact.name: Boston 32.1207
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of Sabina facing right. She is draped and her hair falls down her neck in a plait; it is waved at back and rises on the top in a crest over the stephane above the tiara.
artifact.reverse_type: Draped Concordia stands with her head turned to the left. She is holding a patera in her extended right hand and a double cornucopia (with pendant fillets?) in her left.

artifact.name: Boston 12.514
artifact.donor: Gift of Joseph H. Clark
artifact.obverse_type: Draped bust of Sabina, facing right. Her hair falls in a plait down her neck; it is waved at the back and rises on the top over a stephane above her tiara.
artifact.reverse_type: Draped Venus stands with her head turned to the right. She is holding an apple in her left hand and with her right, she draws the fold of her drapery away from her left shoulder.

artifact.name: Boston 65.562
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Unadorned head of Hadrian, facing right. He is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_type: A draped female figure stands in a 3/4 frontal pose within a dotted circle with her head turned to the right. She is holding a pomegranate (?) in her left hand and a bow in her right.

artifact.name: Boston 65.561
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Laureate head of Hadrian, facing right. He is bearded (as is usual). All within a dotted circle.
artifact.reverse_type: Draped Salus (goddess of health and healing) stands within a dotted circle with her head turned to the right. In her right hand, she is holding a snake, in her left, she is holding an alabastron.

artifact.name: Boston 69.953
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: HADR[IA]NVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Unadorned head of Hadrian, facing right. He is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_type: Ephesian Artemis (Diana) stands to facing the front with fillets hanging from her wrists. To her left and right two stags stand with their heads turned upwards toward her.

artifact.name: Boston 69.954
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of Hadrian, facing right. He is draped, cuirassed, and bearded within a dotted circle.
artifact.reverse_type: Within a dotted circle, Zeus Laodiceus stands with his head turned to the left in long drapery. He holds an eagle on his outstretched right hand and a scepter in his left.

artifact.name: Boston 1977.492
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Cuirassed and draped bust of Hadrian, facing right, bearded (as is usual). This coin is overstruck with traces of the earlier obverse lettering on the right side of flan.
artifact.reverse_type: Amalthea standing within a dotted circle with her head turned to the right wearing a mural crown. She holds infant Jupiter in her left arm, and a scepter in her right hand. At right stands a goat with his head turned up toward Jupiter.

artifact.name: Boston 88.425
artifact.donor: Everett Fund
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of laureate Hadrian, facing right. He is draped over his left shoulder and bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_type: Draped Salus (goddess of health and healing) stands in a 3/4 frontal view with her head turned to the right. She is holding a snake in her right hand and feeding it from the patera she holds in her left.

artifact.name: Boston 92.65
artifact.donor: Bequest of Miss Rebecca Salisbury
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Unadorned, bearded head of Hadrian, facing right.
artifact.reverse_legend: ADVENT VS AVG; S C (in exergue)
artifact.reverse_type: Roma, helmeted and in military dress, stands on the left facing right, holding a vertical spear in her left hand. She is clasping right hands with a togate Hadrian, standing on the right, facing left, with a scroll held in his left hand.

artifact.name: Boston 35.246
artifact.donor: Anonymous Gift in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: SABINA AVGVSTA HADRIANI AVG P P
artifact.obverse_type: Draped bust of laureate Sabina, wearing a tiara and facing left.
artifact.reverse_type: Within a dotted circle, Concordia seated on her throne, facing left. She wears a tiara and is holding a patera (knobbed, sacrificial plate) in her right hand.

artifact.name: Boston 35.253
artifact.donor: Anonymous Gift in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Unadorned head of Aelius, bearded and facing right.
artifact.reverse_legend: TR POT COS II; PANNONIA (across field); S C (across field below)
artifact.reverse_type: Pannonia standing to the front, with her head looking to the left. She holds a standard with her right hand and her drapery with her left.

artifact.name: Boston 00.294
artifact.sources_used: <bibl><hi rend="ital">BMCRE</hi></bibl> III, 424, no. 1255; <bibl>Cohen 1880-1892, 2, Adrien no. 1154</bibl>; <bibl>Perkins Collection 1902, 101, 25</bibl>
artifact.donor: The Catharine Page Perkins Fund
artifact.obverse_type: Laureate bust of Hadrian, facing right. He is draped, cuirassed, and bearded.
artifact.reverse_legend: P M TR P COS III; S C (across field)
artifact.reverse_type: Spes (Hope) walking to the right. She is holding a flower in her right hand and lifting her robe slightly with her left hand.

artifact.name: Boston 00.295
artifact.sources_used: <bibl><hi rend="ital">BMCRE</hi></bibl> III, 465, nos. 1481-1483; <bibl>Cohen 1880-1892, 2, Adrien no. 125</bibl>; <bibl>Perkins Collection 1902, 101, 24</bibl>
artifact.donor: The Catharine Page Perkins Fund
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Laureate head of Hadrian, facing right within a dotted circle. He is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_type: Aequitas standing within a dotted circle with her head turned to the left. In her right hand she is holding a balance and in her left she holds a scepter.

artifact.name: Boston 32.652
artifact.donor: Gift of Malcolm Storer
artifact.obverse_type: Draped bust of Hadrian, facing right within a dotted circle. His head is unadorned and he is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_legend: FELICITATI AVG.; S C (across field); COS III P P (in exergue)
artifact.reverse_type: Galley sailing to the right with a steersman and four rowers. At the stern is an acrostolium, an arch over the steersman, a standard, and a vexillum. At the prow, there is a mast and sail.

artifact.name: Boston 1962 Apparatus no. 3
artifact.donor: Gift of Rosamund Lamb
artifact.obverse_type: Unadorned head of Hadrian, facing right. He is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_legend: ANNO NA AVG; S C (across field)
artifact.reverse_type: Within a dotted circle stands Annona, facing to the left. In her right hand she holds two corn ears over a modius (grain basket) and in her left hand she holds a rudder.

artifact.name: Boston 32.715
artifact.sources_used: <bibl><hi rend="ital">BMCRE</hi></bibl> III, 540, no. 1902, pl. 99.9 (not 99.10), for date, see cl; <bibl>Morgan 1975, 64</bibl>
artifact.donor: Gift of Malcolm Storer
artifact.obverse_type: Draped bust of Sabina, facing right. Her hair is coiled and piled above a double stephane.
artifact.reverse_type: Draped Vesta (goddess of the hearth), sits facing to the left on a low seat holding a palladium in her right hand and a scepter in her left.

artifact.name: Boston 32.620
artifact.donor: Gift of Malcolm Storer
artifact.obverse_type: Laureate bust of Hadrian, drapery on his left (?), and clean shaven (?).
artifact.reverse_legend: P M TR P COS III; VIRT AVG (across field); S C (across field, below)
artifact.reverse_type: Virtus, in military dress, stands with his head turned to the left. His right foot is on a helmet, and he holds a parazonium in his right hand and a spear in his left.

artifact.name: Boston 32.701
artifact.donor: Gift of Malcolm Storer
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of laureate Hadrian, draped and facing right. He is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_type: Fortuna, draped, stands with her head turned to the left. She is holding a patera (a knobbed, sacrificial plate) in her right hand and a cornucopia in her left.

artifact.name: Boston 32.706
artifact.donor: Gift of Malcolm Storer
artifact.obverse_legend: IMP CAESAR TRAIAN HADRIANVS AVG P M TR P COS III
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of laureate Hadrian, facing right. He is draped, cuirassed, and bearded.
artifact.reverse_type: Draped Pietas, stands facing right before a lighted altar. She is raising her right hand and is holding a box of incense in her left.

artifact.name: Boston 32.863
artifact.donor: Gift of Malcolm Storer
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Head of Hadrian, facing right. He is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_type: Hadrian stands in full military dress on the right on low platform facing three soldiers on the right. He is raising his right hand and haranguing the soldiers who carry the legionary eagle, vexillum and standard.

artifact.name: Boston 32.1194
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of laureate Hadrian within a dotted circle, facing right. He is draped, cuirassed, and bearded.
artifact.reverse_legend: IVSTITIA AVG P P; S C (across field); COS III (in exergue)
artifact.reverse_type: Justitia, draped and seated facing left on a throne. She is holding a patera (knobbed, sacrificial plate) in her right hand and a scepter in her left.

artifact.name: Boston 35.257
artifact.donor: Anonymous Gift in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of laureate Hadrian, facing right. He is bearded (as is usual), draped, and cuirassed.
artifact.reverse_legend: P M TR P COS III P C
artifact.reverse_type: Spes (Hope) walking left holding a flower in her right hand and her garment in her left.

artifact.name: Boston 62.563
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Draped bust of Hadrian, facing right. He is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_legend: FORTVNAE RE DVCI; S C (in exergue)
artifact.reverse_type: Togate Hadrian, standing on the left clasps right hands with draped Fortuna who is standing on the right. Hadrian holds a roll in his left hand. Fortuna has a cornucopia on her left arm, and a rudder at her left side.

artifact.name: Boston 63.253
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Laureate bust of Hadrian within a dotted circle, facing right. He is draped on his left shoulder and bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_type: Neptune standing on the left with his right foot on a prow. He holds a dolphin in his right hand and his trident in his left.

artifact.name: Boston 64.2127
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of Hadrian, facing right. He is bearded (as is usual), and draped.
artifact.reverse_type: Personification of Egypt seated, facing left. Egypt holds a sistrum in her right hand and rests her left arm on a basket of fruits. At left stands an ibis on a column.

artifact.name: Boston 65.442
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of laureate Hadrian, facing right. He is draped and bearded.
artifact.reverse_legend: ADVENTVI AVG CI LICIAE; S C (in exergue)
artifact.reverse_type: Hadrian stands on the left holding a roll and facing a personification of Cilicia on the right. Cilicia holds a patera (knobbed, sacrificial plate) above a lighted altar in her right hand and a vexillum in her left hand.

artifact.name: Boston 65.444
artifact.sources_used: <bibl><hi rend="ital">BMCRE</hi></bibl> III, 494, no. 1664; <bibl>Cohen 1880-1892, 2.111.63, without obverse drapery</bibl>
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Draped bust of Hadrian, facing right. He is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_legend: ADVENTVI AVG MAV RETANIAE; S C (in exergue)
artifact.reverse_type: Hadrian stands on the left with a roll in his left hand facing the personification of Mauretania who is standing at the right with a vexillum in her left hand and a patera (knobbed, sacrificial plate) in right. A lighted altar stands between them and a bull stands behind.

artifact.name: Boston 65.445
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of laureate Hadrian, facing right. He is bearded (as is usual) and draped on his left shoulder.
artifact.reverse_type: Neptune stands facing to the right with his right foot on a prow (?). He is holding a trident in his right hand and an acrostolium in his left.

artifact.name: Boston 65.448
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Draped bust of Hadrian, facing left. He is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_type: Hadrian in military dress on horseback facing right. He is looking at three soldiers holding a legionary eagle and standards.

artifact.name: Boston 65.449
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Laureate bust of Hadrian, facing right. He is draped and bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_type: The personification of the Nile reclines, looking to the right. He holds in his left hand a cornucopia, and is flanked on each side by an infant. At the right, a hippopotamus stands facing left. Reeds stand behind him and a crocodile below.

artifact.name: Boston 68.708
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Draped bust of Hadrian, facing right. He is bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_type: The personification of Alexandria reclines facing left, her left arm rests on a basket of grain. She is holding ears of grain and a poppy in her right hand and a vine branch in her left. Grain is growing on the left.

artifact.name: Boston 1970.66
artifact.sources_used: <bibl><hi rend="ital">BMCRE</hi></bibl> III, 431, no. 1294 ff., for general type, all vary
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of Hadrian, facing right. He is draped on his left shoulder and bearded.
artifact.reverse_legend: CO S III; S C (in exergue)
artifact.reverse_type: Helmeted Roma seated, facing to the left on a cuirass, holding a cornucopia in her left hand, and Victory with a wreath on her right hand. At her side are a shield and quiver (?). A helmet and greave by her feet.

artifact.name: Boston 1972.77
artifact.sources_used: <bibl><hi rend="ital">BMCRE</hi></bibl> III, 519, no. 1797, variable; note 1797 (this specimen = Trau, no. 1280); for dating see cxliv
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVG COS III P P
artifact.obverse_type: Within a dotted circle, a laureate bust of Hadrian, facing left. He is draped, cuirassed, and bearded.
artifact.reverse_legend: RESTITV TORI ARABIAE; S C (in exergue)
artifact.reverse_type: Togate Hadrian stands on the left. He extends his right hand to help up a kneeling personification of Arabia. A camel stands between them.

artifact.name: Boston 1982.601
artifact.donor: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Cornelius C. Vermeule III in the name of Cornelius Adrian Comstock Vermeule
artifact.obverse_type: Laureate bust of Hadrian, facing right. He is draped, cuirassed, and bearded (as is usual).
artifact.reverse_legend: P M TR P COS III; S C (across field)
artifact.reverse_type: Ceres, standing in a 3/4 frontal view facing left, holds a long torch in her left hand, and ears of grain in her right.

artifact.name: Boston 1982.602
artifact.donor: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Cornelius C. Vermeule III in the name of Cornelius Adrian Comstock Vermeule
artifact.obverse_legend: IMP CAESAR TRAIANVS HADRIA NVS AVG P M TR P COS III
artifact.obverse_type: Laureate bust of Hadrian, facing right. His bust is cut to make him appear as if he were draped.
artifact.reverse_legend: VICTOR IA AVGVSTI; S C (across field)
artifact.reverse_type: Winged Victory stands looking to the right. She holds a trophy in her right hand.

artifact.name: Boston 1985.234
artifact.sources_used: <bibl><hi rend="ital">BMCRE</hi></bibl> III, 453, no. 1400, note and clxx for date; <bibl>Cohen 1880-1892, 2.668 with Triton</bibl>
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_legend: HADRIANVS AVGVSTVS (last two A's written without crossbars)
artifact.obverse_type: Laureate bust of Hadrian, facing right. He is draped and bearded.
artifact.reverse_legend: FELICITATI AVG (above, first A written without crossbars); COS III P P (in exergue); S C (across field)
artifact.reverse_type: Galley with six rowers and a steersman. Triton stands on the prow blowing his horn and a legionary eagle and standard are in the stern.

artifact.name: Boston 1986.890
artifact.donor: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Cornelius C. Vermeule III in the name of Cornelius Adrian Comstock Vermeule
artifact.obverse_type: Within a dotted circle, bust of laureate Hadrian, facing right. He is draped, cuirassed, and bearded.
artifact.reverse_legend: PM TR P CO S III; VIR T AVG / S C (across field)
artifact.reverse_type: Virtus stands facing front, with her right foot on a helmet. She is holding a spear in her right hand, and a parazonium on her left arm.

artifact.name: Boston 35.690
artifact.donor: Anonymous Gift in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Within a dotted circle, bust of Sabina, facing right. She is draped and wears her hair in a plait down her neck. She wears a tiara.
artifact.reverse_type: Venus standing with her head turned to the right. She is holding her garment in her right hand and an apple in her left.

artifact.name: Boston 1982.603
artifact.sources_used: <bibl><hi rend="ital">BMCRE</hi></bibl> III, 536, no. 1867 (with wreath on corn ears; see clxxxiv for date)
artifact.donor: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Cornelius C. Vermeule III in the name of Cornelius Adrian Comstock Vermeule
artifact.obverse_legend: SABINA AVGVSTA HADRIANI AVG P P
artifact.obverse_type: Bust of Sabina, facing right. She is draped and wears her hair in a plait down her neck. She wears a tiara.
artifact.reverse_legend: CONCOR DIA AVG; S C (in exergue)
artifact.reverse_type: Concordia (goddess of harmony) enthroned faces left. She holds a patera (knobbed, sacrificial plate) in her right hand, she rests her left arm on a statuette of Spes (hope).

artifact.name: Boston 67.630
artifact.donor: Theodora Wilbour Fund in Memory of Zoë Wilbour
artifact.obverse_type: Within a dotted circle, the bare bust of L. Aelius, bearded, facing right
artifact.reverse_legend: TR POT COS II (around); S C (across field, left and right)
artifact.reverse_type: Within a dotted circle, the figure of Spes (the personification of Hope), walking to the left, holding a flower in her right hand and her skirt in her left
